const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "metrics_index",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      network: {
        properties: {
          name: {
            type: "keyword",
          },
        },
      },
      latency_histo: {
        type: "histogram",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "metrics_index",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    "network.name": "net-1",
    latency_histo: {
      values: [1, 3, 8, 12, 15],
      counts: [3, 7, 23, 12, 6],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.index({
  index: "metrics_index",
  id: 2,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    "network.name": "net-2",
    latency_histo: {
      values: [1, 6, 8, 12, 14],
      counts: [8, 17, 8, 7, 6],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response2);

const response3 = await client.search({
  index: "metrics_index",
  size: 0,
  aggs: {
    latency_buckets: {
      histogram: {
        field: "latency_histo",
        interval: 5,
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response3);
